original_text: Meshech and Tubal are also there in their graves, with their soldiers all around. When they were alive, they made people very afraid. Now they have all died in battle and none of them belongs to God. Meshech and Tubal are also there in their graves, with their soldiers all around. When they were alive, they made people very afraid. Now they have all died in battle and none of them belongs to God. Meshech and Tubal are also there in their graves, with their soldiers all around. When they were alive, they made people very afraid. Now they have all died in battle and none of them belongs to God.
korean_text: 거기에 메섹과 두발과 그 모든 무리가 있고 그 여러 무덤은 사방에 있음이여 그들은 다 할례를 받지 못하고 칼에 죽임을 당한 자로다 그들이 생존하는 사람들의 세상에서 두렵게 하였으나

sentences.original_text: Meshech and Tubal are also there in their graves
sentences.korean_translation: 므세과와 두발도 그들의 무덤에 거기에 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Now they have all died in battle
and none of them belongs to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 중 누구도 하나님께 속하지 않습니다
